pkgmetadata.longdescription: Marginal Proportional Hazards Mixture Cure Models with Generalized Estimating Equations // Features the marginal parametric and semi-parametric proportional hazards mixture cure models for analyzing clustered survival data with a possible cure fraction. A reference is Yi Niu and Yingwei Peng (2014) doi:10.1016/j.jmva.2013.09.003.
